channel.title: Runescape;
channel.description:
Welcome to my latest development, here's a little information about why and what the server is about;
[b]Information[/b] This server has been in development for, well about 6 hours. It's pretty basic stuff I have done, there's a small f2p server and a small p2p server. I have not added all the NPC's on the p2p server but I will update soon. The server has been created for fun, nothing more, we also want to see more people using f2p and p2p servers not for MONEY but for popularity, every member of mine had to earn their position as a member, not pay for it.
[b]Features[/b]
[ul][li]F2P[/li] [li]P2P[/li] [li]Player Vs player[/li] [li]All Runescape Shops[/li] [li]Mining 80%[/li] [li]Woodcutting 10%[/li] [li]Fletching 10%[/li] [li]Working Tz Caves 50%[/li] [li]2005 F2P Runescape added 80% (Some items in shops need to be removed)[/li] [li]All Runescape F2P NPC's are added in correct place[/li][/ul]
Here's some of the server pictures;
[b]Pictures[/b] [img]http://i193.photobucket.com/albums/z147/ownerhami/lumbridge.jpg[/img] [img]http://i193.photobucket.com/albums/z147/ownerhami/varrock.jpg[/img]
Sorry, I can't take any more tonight, also the p2p items require you to be a member, otherwise you cant wield them.
[size=15pt]Note[/size] This is only version 1, the next version (v.2) I'm hoping to have sound effects and it's own client.

Hmm… Why not just remove all Member Items, P2p Items instead of leaving them in there, shouldn’t take but a good 45 minutes to remove it all. But nice, good luck. I’m inspired seeing people doing advanced or somewhat good work now-a-days, we’re getting better
[/quote]
Dude your sig is sooo much win[/quote]

he stole it from Rune-s

Welcome to my latest development, here’s a little information about why and what the server is about;

Information
This server has been in development for, well about 6 hours. It’s pretty basic stuff I have done, there’s a small f2p server and a small p2p server.
